name: Mini Maker (WIP)
description:
A minifigure-building game for
those who like to make a mess.

You are the Mini Maker taking wacky client requests in this messy-workshop-in-a-rush simulator. Glue, paint and add effects to action figures, mutant plants, ancient sculptures and more. Tackle unpredictable work hazards. Shop for supplies and tools. Share your creations with the world! 

There are no mistakes (or undo button) in Mini Maker, only happy accidents.

~What players say about Mini Maker~ "It's like Bob Ross meets grotesque 3D Lego." "You are Sid from Toy Story making toys from
random pieces, but you are not a sociopath." "That was wild!" ~About this prototype~

Mini Maker has been in development since late 2019. We pitch it at Demo Night 2020 and audience and streamers loved the concept. The game is currently in development and we aim at an early 2022 release. We want you to be part of its development! Play the prototype and tell us what you would like to see in the final game!
